participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and independent, Alex is always looking for new challenges and loves connecting with nature.
participant_1.background: My parents taught me survival skills. I walk dogs for a living. I'm an avid kayaker. I'm also a graduate student.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Sarah finds joy in crafting and baking, while being a loving mother.
participant_2.background: Knitting is my passion. I love to bake cookies. The county-wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I have dogs. I am scared of dying.

content.text: Hi! Well, I have a dog and I always scared to killed by it
